entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dundalk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:22 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.3°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
